name: Psychonauts Sweded
description:
This is a remake of the Double Fine classic "Psychonauts", made in a low-budget "sweded" style in Unreal.

It's a 5 minute short, fun experience that I made back in December 2015. Around that time "Psychonauts 2" was announced, and inspired me to do this little project. Since the sequel chose Unreal as it's engine, I thought it would be a fun gimmick to remake the first game in Unreal.

The production, including getting into Unreal (I never worked with it before!) took one week.
